website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Air Max 270 Futura borrows from the original AM 270 it's iconic exaggerated heel Air unit and midsole design and embeds a fresh, new upper on top of it. This edition fuses a variety of textures together through overlays and underlays for a unique look, breathability, stability, and support.This stylish Air Max sneaker gives off a retro yet modern aesthetic and meets the essentials of a great everyday shoe including superior comfort, budget-friendly price, and durability.
pros: The majority of the reviewers express delight at how comfortable the Nike Air Max 270 Futura is
Several purchasers commend the sneaker's excellent workmanship
Almost all reviewers adore the stylish design of the Nike Air Max 270 Futura
Some shoe users are ecstatic that they had gotten compliments because of this pair
A handful of buyers express satisfaction regarding this shoe's value for money and said that it is a practical kick to buy
Many commenters say they would recommend this kind of Nike sneakers to friends and family
cons: A couple of testers say that the Nike Air Max 270 Futura runs a bit tight in the toe area
The very large Air unit in the heel takes a little getting used to

customer_reviews.title: ....meh.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes came exactly as advertised. Brand new condition and made of the high quality material you would expect from a company like Nike. However, I found these shoes to be incredibly ugly once I saw them in person. Probably not a bad running shoe if you don’t mind that it looks like you have turds on your feet.
customer_reviews.author: Reuben Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Dang good deal
customer_reviews.text: Strong Nikes and the last pair on Amazon for around $40. I was just lucky to find these. Beating them up as a medical provider on 12 l+ hour shifts and they’re doing fine. Fraying at the toe area has been more than my 270 Bowfins
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nike fan
customer_reviews.text: Husband is a Nike fan and this shoe did not disappoint. Fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: DLMosesLake

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fit like they said they would
customer_reviews.text: The sneakers look a little old like they’ve been sitting in the sun for a very long time. The black suede on the shoes is faded and looks like it’s 10 years old luckily it’s only on a small area of the shoes. Anymore I would’ve returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Souza

customer_reviews.title: Good thing that I pay not much
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that is toe very narrow. Hope I will get used to them.
customer_reviews.author: Ghennady Sokolinsky

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes and comfortable. Great for walking but you can definitely run in them too.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Diaz Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality terrible costumer service
customer_reviews.text: This item is defective and no repoos available. Terrible quality and worst customer service frm Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Nike is the Shizi!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable & look good too.. already got a few compliments from strangers.
customer_reviews.author: Cdub

customer_reviews.title: Fit and finish is as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe. I wear it more for work but I’ve logged a few miles jogging in it as well.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Comfortable and I get compliments on them at the gym all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Solar red?
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very comfortable. Solar red is not red its florescent pink. Nothing a red sharpey cant take care of.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Air Max 270 Futura Competition Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Men's running shoes Nike Air Max 270 FUTURA AO1569-003
feature_bullets: Der Air Max 270 Futura für Herren von Nike ist ein Sneaker für Alltag und Freizeit.
Asymmetrische Schnürung sorgt für eine individuelle Passform
